          Returns a view of the portion of this result between the specified fromIndex, inclusive, and toIndex, exclusive.

          Returns a sub result of this result that consists of all messages that share the specified message key.

ValidationResult を返す org.seasar.golf.validation.util のメソッド
 ValidationResult ValidationResultModelContainer.getCollapsedValidationResult()
          Returns the collapsed validation result, i. e. a ValidationResult that just consists of a single ValidationMessage; in this case the collapsed validation message.

          Returns the concatenation of all validation results that are held by this container.

          Returns the default ValidationResult.
 ValidationResult DefaultValidationResultModel.getResult()
